title: Decapitalize First Letter in Python (Challenge)
description: In Python, strings are immutable, meaning that they cannot be changed once they are created. However, there are times when we need to modify a string, such as when we want to decapitalize the first letter. This can be useful when dealing with user input or when formatting strings for display purposes. In this challenge, you will be tasked with writing a function that decapitalizes the first letter of a string.

meta.title: Decapitalize First Letter in Python (Challenge)
meta.description: Learn how to write a Python function to decapitalize the first letter of a string, with an optional parameter to convert the rest of the string to uppercase.
meta.keywords: string manipulation, decapitalize, uppercase, python, programming challenge
